sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_customerservice_contact_relationship</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_customerservice_contact_relationship">responsibilityISNOTEMPTY^responsibility.unique=true^EQ<item endquery="false" field="responsibility" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/> <item endquery="false" field="responsibility.unique" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Check duplicate for responsibility</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var gr = new GlideRecord("sn_customerservice_contact_relationship"); gr.addQuery('company', current.company); gr.addQuery('responsibility', current.responsibility); gr.query(); if (gr.next()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("{0} already has {1} as unique responsibility, duplicate not allowed for this account", [current.company.getDisplayValue(), current.responsibility.getDisplayValue()])); current.setAbortAction(true); return; } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-03-09 22:37:09</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>0b49a2f1c3021200e94a9f2974d3aef0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Check duplicate for responsibility</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Customer Service" source="sn_customerservice">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service">51d811fad7223100b7490ee60e61034f</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0b49a2f1c3021200e94a9f2974d3aef0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-03-09 22:37:09</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0b49a2f1c3021200e94a9f2974d3aef0"/> </record_update>
